original_text: The disciples said to him, “Rabbi, the Jews were just now seeking to stone you, and are you going there again?”
korean_text: 제자들이 말하되 랍비여 방금도 유대인들이 돌로 치려 하였는데 또 그리로 가시려 하나이까

sentences.original_text: the Jews were just now seeking to stone you
sentences.korean_translation: 유대인들이 방금 당신을 돌로 치려고 했습니다

sentences.original_text: and are you going there again?
